description:
Data that enables new officers to appear in scenarios for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".
Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited.

As a collaboration with characters from the anime based on Yoshiki Tanaka's renowned Sci-fi novel "Legend of the Galactic Heroes", the Galactic Empire's Reuenthal, Mittermeyer, Oberstein, and Hilda are added.
Reinhard's elite subjects who worked behind the scenes to aid him on his path to conquest. 

▼Additional Officers
Reuenthal, Mittermeyer, Oberstein, Hilda

▼How to use
After selecting a scenario from "Start New->Select Scenario" screen, at the "Officer Settings" screen, use "Introduce Orig. Officer" to select an officer.

Note: Limited free distribution until　February 24, 2021!
name: "Legend of the Galactic Heroes" Collab: Empire vol.1
